trans-unit.source: Windows edition upgrade policy settings | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Windows edition upgrade policy settings | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Learn how to automatically upgrade Windows 10 devices to the latest version with Intune.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to automatically upgrade Windows 10 devices to the latest version with Intune.

trans-unit.source: Windows edition upgrade policy settings in Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Windows edition upgrade policy settings in Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Intune **Edition Upgrade Policy** lets you automatically upgrade devices that run one of the following Windows 10 versions to a newer edition:
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Intune **Edition Upgrade Policy** lets you automatically upgrade devices that run one of the following Windows 10 versions to a newer edition:

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 Desktop
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 Desktop

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 Holographic
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 Holographic

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 Mobile
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 Mobile

trans-unit.source: Before you start
trans-unit.target: Before you start

trans-unit.source: Before you begin to upgrade devices to the latest version, you will need one of the following:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin to upgrade devices to the latest version, you will need one of the following:

trans-unit.source: A product key that is valid to install the new version of Windows on all devices that you target with the policy (for Windows 10 Desktop editions).
trans-unit.target: A product key that is valid to install the new version of Windows on all devices that you target with the policy (for Windows 10 Desktop editions).

trans-unit.source: You can use either Multiple Activation Keys (MAK) or Key Management Server (KMS) keys.
trans-unit.target: You can use either Multiple Activation Keys (MAK) or Key Management Server (KMS) keys.

trans-unit.source: **or** A license file from Microsoft that contains the licensing information to install the new version of Windows on all devices that you target with the policy (for Windows 10 Mobile and Windows 10 Holographic editions).
trans-unit.target: **or** A license file from Microsoft that contains the licensing information to install the new version of Windows on all devices that you target with the policy (for Windows 10 Mobile and Windows 10 Holographic editions).

trans-unit.source: The Windows 10 devices that you target must be enrolled in Microsoft Intune.
trans-unit.target: The Windows 10 devices that you target must be enrolled in Microsoft Intune.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the edition upgrade policy with PCs that run the Intune PC client software.
trans-unit.target: You cannot use the edition upgrade policy with PCs that run the Intune PC client software.

trans-unit.source: Edition upgrade policy settings
trans-unit.target: Edition upgrade policy settings

trans-unit.source: Setting name
trans-unit.target: Setting name

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for the edition upgrade policy.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name for the edition upgrade policy.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optionally, enter a description for the policy that helps you identify it in the Intune console.
trans-unit.target: Optionally, enter a description for the policy that helps you identify it in the Intune console.

trans-unit.source: Edition to upgrade to
trans-unit.target: Edition to upgrade to

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down list, select the version of Windows 10 Desktop, Windows 10 Holographic, or Windows 10 Mobile that you want to upgrade targeted devices to.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down list, select the version of Windows 10 Desktop, Windows 10 Holographic, or Windows 10 Mobile that you want to upgrade targeted devices to.

trans-unit.source: Product Key
trans-unit.target: Product Key

trans-unit.source: Specify the product key that you obtained from Microsoft, which can be used to upgrade all targeted Windows 10 Desktop devices.
trans-unit.target: Specify the product key that you obtained from Microsoft, which can be used to upgrade all targeted Windows 10 Desktop devices.

trans-unit.source: After you create a policy that contains a product key, you cannot edit the product key later.
trans-unit.target: After you create a policy that contains a product key, you cannot edit the product key later.

trans-unit.source: This is because the key is obscured for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: This is because the key is obscured for security reasons.

trans-unit.source: To change the product key, you must enter the entire key again.
trans-unit.target: To change the product key, you must enter the entire key again.

trans-unit.source: License File
trans-unit.target: License File

trans-unit.source: Choose **Browse** to select the license file you obtained from Microsoft that contains license information for the Windows Holographic, or Windows 10 Mobile edition that you want to upgrade targeted devices to.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Browse** to select the license file you obtained from Microsoft that contains license information for the Windows Holographic, or Windows 10 Mobile edition that you want to upgrade targeted devices to.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies
trans-unit.target: Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies
